languages.text: "Не знала, что имперскому навигатору требуется разрешение на подобное. Впредь постараюсь следовать самобытным правилам вашего корабля более... внимательно". {n}Кассия отводит укоризненный взгляд, но продолжает держать подбородок высоко и с достоинством.{/n} "Не смею более смущать вас своим присутствием".

traits.locale_text: "Не знала, что имперскому Навигатору требуется разрешение на подобное. Впредь постараюсь следовать самобытным правилам вашего корабля более... внимательно". {n}Кассия отводит укоризненный взгляд, но продолжает держать подбородок высоко и с достоинством.{/n} "Не смею более смущать вас своим присутствием".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I was not aware that a Navigator of my station required such permission. I shall henceforth be more... astute in following the particular regulations of your ship." {n}Cassia's reproachful gaze shifts away from you as she continues to hold her chin high with dignity.{/n} "I shall burden you with my presence no longer."
languages.original_text: "Не знала, что имперскому навигатору требуется разрешение на подобное. Впредь постараюсь следовать самобытным правилам вашего корабля более... внимательно". {n}Кассия отводит укоризненный взгляд, но продолжает держать подбородок высоко и с достоинством.{/n} "Не смею более смущать вас своим присутствием".

traits.locale_text: "I was not aware that a Navigator of the Imperium required such permission. I shall henceforth be more... astute in following the particular rules of your ship." {n}Cassia's reproachful gaze shifts away from you as she continues to hold her chin high with dignity.{/n} "I shall burden you with my presence no longer."

traits.locale_text: "I was not aware that a Navigator of my station required such permission. I shall henceforth be more... astute in following the particular regulations of your ship." {n}Cassia's reproachful gaze shifts away from you as she continues to hold her chin high with dignity.{/n} "I shall burden you with my presence no longer."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Mir war nicht bewusst, dass eine Navigatorin von meinem Stand eine solche Erlaubnis benötigt. Ich werde fortan ... scharfsinniger sein, was die speziellen Vorschriften Eures Schiffs angeht." {n}Cassias tadelnder Blick wendet sich von dir ab, sie hält ihr Kinn jedoch weiterhin würdevoll hoch gereckt.{/n} "Ich werde Euch nicht länger mit meiner Anwesenheit belasten."
languages.original_text: "I was not aware that a Navigator of my station required such permission. I shall henceforth be more... astute in following the particular regulations of your ship." {n}Cassia's reproachful gaze shifts away from you as she continues to hold her chin high with dignity.{/n} "I shall burden you with my presence no longer."

traits.locale_text: "Mir war nicht bewusst, dass ein Navigator des Imperiums eine solche Erlaubnis benötigt. Ich werde fortan ... scharfsinniger sein, was die speziellen Regeln Eures Schiffs angeht." {n}Cassias tadelnder Blick wendet sich von dir ab, sie hält ihr Kinn jedoch weiterhin würdevoll hoch gereckt.{/n} "Ich werde Euch nicht länger mit meiner Anwesenheit belasten."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « J'ignorais qu'une navigatrice de mon statut avait besoin d'une telle autorisation. Je serai plus... attentive aux régulations en vigueur à bord de votre vaisseau, à l'avenir. » {n}Cassia détourne de vous un regard plein de reproches, tout en gardant le menton relevé avec dignité.{/n} « Je ne vais pas vous importuner par ma présence plus longtemps. »
languages.original_text: "I was not aware that a Navigator of my station required such permission. I shall henceforth be more... astute in following the particular regulations of your ship." {n}Cassia's reproachful gaze shifts away from you as she continues to hold her chin high with dignity.{/n} "I shall burden you with my presence no longer."

traits.locale_text: « J'ignorais qu'une navigatrice de l'Imperium avait besoin d'une telle autorisation. Je serai plus... attentive aux règles en vigueur à bord de votre vaisseau, à l'avenir. » {n}Cassia détourne son regard plein de reproches de vous, en gardant le menton relevé avec dignité.{/n} « Je ne vais pas vous importuner par ma présence plus longtemps. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我并不清楚像我们这样的导航者还需要得到这样的许可。从今以后，我会更加注意遵守……贵舰的种种特殊规矩。”{n}卡西娅以非难的目光瞥了你一眼，高傲地抬起了头。{/n}“我就不再叨扰舰长大人了。”
languages.original_text: "I was not aware that a Navigator of my station required such permission. I shall henceforth be more... astute in following the particular regulations of your ship." {n}Cassia's reproachful gaze shifts away from you as she continues to hold her chin high with dignity.{/n} "I shall burden you with my presence no longer."

traits.locale_text: “我并不清楚帝国的导航者还需要得到这样的许可。从今以后，我会更加注意遵守……贵舰的种种特殊规则。”{n}卡西娅以非难的目光瞥了你一眼，高傲地抬起了头。{/n}“我就不再叨扰舰长大人了。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あたくしほどの地位の航宙士が、そのような許可を必要とするとは存じませんでした。以後は、今まで以上に…貴船の規則に、より注意深く従うことといたします」{n}カシアの咎めるようなまなざしはあなたから離れ、威厳ある様子で顎を高くあげる。{/n}「これ以上、お邪魔はいたしません」
languages.original_text: "I was not aware that a Navigator of my station required such permission. I shall henceforth be more... astute in following the particular regulations of your ship." {n}Cassia's reproachful gaze shifts away from you as she continues to hold her chin high with dignity.{/n} "I shall burden you with my presence no longer."

traits.locale_text: 「あたくしほどの地位の航宙士が、そのような許可を必要とするとは存じませんでした。以後は、今まで以上に…貴船の規則に、より注意深く従うことといたします」{n}カシアの咎めるようなまなざしはあなたから離れ、威厳ある様子で顎を高くあげる。{/n}「これ以上、お邪魔はいたしません」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «No sabía que una navegante de mi estatus requiriera tal permiso. A partir de ahora seré más... avispada a la hora de seguir las regulaciones de su nave». {n}La mirada de reproche de Cassia se aparta de ti mientras sigue manteniendo la barbilla alta con dignidad.{/n} «No le molestaré más con mi presencia».
languages.original_text: "I was not aware that a Navigator of my station required such permission. I shall henceforth be more... astute in following the particular regulations of your ship." {n}Cassia's reproachful gaze shifts away from you as she continues to hold her chin high with dignity.{/n} "I shall burden you with my presence no longer."

traits.locale_text: «No sabía que una navegante de mi estatus requiriera tal permiso. A partir de ahora seré más... avispada a la hora de seguir las regulaciones de su nave». {n}La mirada de reproche de Cassia se aparta de ti mientras sigue manteniendo la barbilla alta con dignidad.{/n} «No le molestaré más con mi presencia».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I was not aware that a Navigator of my station required such permission. I shall henceforth be more... astute in following the particular regulations of your ship." {n}Cassia's reproachful gaze shifts away from you as she continues to hold her chin high with dignity.{/n} "I shall burden you with my presence no longer."

languages.text: "Mevkimdeki bir Rotacı'nın böyle bir izne gereksinim duyduğundan haberim yoktu. Bundan böyle geminin kurallarına... Ziyadesiyle dikkat edeceğimden şüphen olmasın." {n}Başı dik ve asaletli duruşunu bozmayan Cassia, sitemkâr bakışlarını senden kaçırıyor.{/n} "Ben seni daha fazla rahatsız etmeyeyim."
languages.original_text: "I was not aware that a Navigator of my station required such permission. I shall henceforth be more... astute in following the particular regulations of your ship." {n}Cassia's reproachful gaze shifts away from you as she continues to hold her chin high with dignity.{/n} "I shall burden you with my presence no longer."
